name: Todo App
description: Todo application using React. Uses Nodejs as backend and Postgresql as database, both are deployed onto the cloud. You can see it in action at https://1kangyun1.github.io/react-todo-app

name: Dungeons and Slimes
description: Deungeon defence game where you mutate and spawn slimes to fend off heros. Created in a team of 4.

name: HomeLight
description: Story driven game about a blind child finding his way home. Created in a team of 5.

name: PenguinRun
description: Platforming game about a penguin with its ability to change its orientation. Created in a team of 4.

name: WavePong
description: Basic Pong game but played in a circular map. Created in a team of 2.
